channel.title: internet on Life inside a computer
channel.description: Recent content in internet on Life inside a computer

item.title: In defence of GNOME Web
item.description: So you probably already know that Mozilla recently went bang and fired 25% of its workforce before announcing that whoops lol actually we are still going to be able to feed the hungry fox this year. Among the teams affected were the servo developers, a lot of the threat response team, and (I believe) the entirety of the team behind MDN: the only good resource for web development don’t @ me.

item.title: Bring back my internet
item.description: Mixed messages Okay, so I’m slightly reneging on my earlier post by writing about computers again, but trust me when I say this one is as much personal as it is technical. Back in t' day It seems so bizarre to me that people are taken aback by my not having a Facebook account. Or a Twitter account. Or anything that they have bar email. I’ll add you on Facebook.
